scripts.install: concurrently "cd log && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-data-api && npm install --no-optional " "cd proxy && npm install --no-optional" "cd excel-connect && npm install --no-optional " "cd lme-core && npm install --no-optional" "cd formulajs-connect && npm install --no-optional" "cd git-connect && npm install --no-optional" "cd ffl && npm install --no-optional" "cd math && npm install --no-optional"
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "cd lme-data-api && node lme-data-app.js" "cd proxy && node proxy.js"
